description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Help Zack and his dog Scooby explore the planet Pongo, meet the weird and wonderful inhabitants of another world and take photos and samples of all you see. 3 mini games including Maths, Spot the difference and Jigsaws. For ages 3+
